alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 17 at 9:29PM CDT until March 19 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins along the bayou with a few structures right along the bayou threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 17.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 15.2 Fri 9 pm CDT 17.3 14.4 9.5 &&
